WorkItem.Description:
One of my applications uses Microsoft.Practices.Unity version 2.0.414.0 which references Microsoft.Practices.ServiceLocation version 1.0.0.0
I'm using MVVM Light for my UI and it's using Microsoft.Practices.ServiceLocation version 1.3.0.0
How can I resolve this issue so the Unity dll will reference the dll that is used by MVVM Light toolkit?

Comments.Message:
Hi,

You should check with Unity why they are still using 1.0.0. Get them to update to the latest version.

Thanks
Laurent
